entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:28 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 04:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: WNW 22 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the morning and in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023
